name: ts-useful
description: Functions for animation, color transitions, ecliptic, bezier, decasteljau, curves, three dimensional curves, smooth scrolling, random range, randomItem, mobius index, vectors, gravity vectors, and easing.

scripts.remove: npm uninstall -D @types/chai @types/mocha chai del-cli esm jsdom jsdom-global mocha nyc sinon
scripts.exectest: set TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.commonjs.json&& nyc mocha -r ts-node/register -r esm -r jsdom-global/register test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.setup: npm i -D @types/chai @types/mocha chai esm jsdom jsdom-global mocha nyc sinon
scripts.test: npm run setup && npm run exectest && npm run remove
scripts.prepare: npm run getclean && npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run test

author: Aaron Edwards
